data.message: I was wondering why you don't have a autism emoji please think about it my grandson is autistic it would mean the world to me and many others. Thank you for your time ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

replies.message: Thanks for your suggestion, Tammy. If there's something you'd like to see on Facebook,  please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2bV6joC. :) -Jessica
I was wondering if you could put autism emoji's. You see that my grandson is autistic and my daughter has friends with autism it's a good for them to talk.

So. Hi Facebook! You do reply? Ok you cant help with this but it affects facebook. I'm constantly having password problems unfortunately with G. I dont even want to writw the name but i would think you would know the big company. 3 times in 1 week i was made to change my password to get into facebook and messemger too. I wonder if anyone has such trouble? I've used computers since they came out. And its very user unfriendly. Its the times but what times. Everyone's hacking and the world has changed dramatically in the last 20 years. If you have password advice i dont know. I would appreciate if you did Tnanks

Great question, Teddy. The password you create should be unique and  you should never use the same password on multiple sites. To learn how to create a secure password, visit: http://bit.ly/2lUuJPe. -Jon
